title: Cheese Trails
oneLine: The smelly Dream of every Rodent
summary:
A top-down adventure/puzzle game where you play as a mouse exploring below the floorboards of multiple houses to find some cheese. 

Made for an entry-assignment for the game Design course at ZHdK with the given theme “Spur / Trace” 

The game was made in Unity and over the course of ~2½ Weeks, with around 130 hours spent on concept and development.
projectStatus: Prototype with 3 Levels and a Tutorial finished
usedSoftware: Pixel FX Designer (Particle Effect Generator Tool)
developedMechanics: Multiple different levels designed with self made Tilemaps
